alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:32AM CST until March 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek AT Courtland affecting Lawrence County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek AT Courtland. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins on the left bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to gradually rise to a crest of 14.5 feet later this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.5 feet on 02/24/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
